p: A mixture of the required compound 4 (2.3 mmol) and aminoguanidine hydrochloride (2 mmol) in ethanol (20 ml) in the presence of 5 drops of concentrated hydrochloric acid was stirred at 50–60 °C for 8–12 h. The solvent was then removed under reduced pressure. The crude products were purified by silica gel column chromatography using dichloromethane:methanol (10:1) as the eluent.
